Function Documentation

gboolean gappman_close_listener ( GIOChannel *  gio  ) 

Closes a listener.

Parameters:
*gio pointer to an open GIOChannel, if NULL it will close gappman's listener
Returns:
TRUE if closing the channel succeeded. False otherwise.

void gappman_set_confpath ( const gchar *  path  ) 

sets the configuration file location so it can be send to clients asking for it.

Parameters:
*path string containing the absolute path to the configuration file for gappman.

gboolean gappman_start_listener ( GtkWidget *  win  ) 

Starts the gappman listener. Should be started only once.

Returns:
TRUE if setting up the channel succeeded. False otherwise.
